name: Add rows to Google Sheets from Netlify form submissions
description: Every time a new Netlify form is submitted, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheet. This example uses [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KGDXEcM2tkplGyzDfJJ16G_pYkSXPNawnnNcjN7kWl0/edit#gid=0).
